# BAUX Roadmap

**v0.1 (Done)**: Monorepo structure, gutted legacy, MVP core (baux wrapper, bauxrc, init.lua).

**v0.2**: Neovim LSPs (clangd, pyright, arduino-language-server, sqls, lua_ls).

**v0.3**: RoxieOS seed (rebrand, config menu, bashtop shortcut).

**v0.4**: Forge automation (Makefile for debs/ISOs).

**v0.5**: Demo workflows (Wi-Fi Sniffer flashing).

**v1.0**: Pi Zero port (armhf debs), distributed layouts (SSH reconnect).
